text: We choose to add this place to our trip itinerary in the last day trip. The museum is absolutely beautiful and amazing. Lots of great picture can be taken here. Entrance fee is 10,000 KRW

Our son enjoys modern art and so we choose to add this gallery to our trip itinerary. We found though we all thoroughly enjoyed this gallery and found it most interesting. My only comment would be there are alot of stairs to get up to the different levels and some are very narrow.
